

:local int digx
:local int digy
:global int finish

isopen("mine")

; This script isn't finished yet
finish = 0

; Mine from bottom right to middle left
digx = 3
digy = 3

; Loop through X and Y here
dig(digx, digy)
digx = digx - 1
gotoif(4, digx >= 0)
; End X loop

digx = 3
digy = digy - 1
gotoif(4, digy >= 2)
; End Y loop

; Tell the parent script that this script is finished
finish = 1
